Series.Overview: Bob hears of a contest to build a new community in a remote area called Sunflower Valley, outside of Bobsville. He moves from Bobsville (supposedly temporarily) with Wendy and the team and builds a new yard there. Bob convinces his father, Robert, to come out of retirement and take over the Bobsville building business. It is not known whether Bob will return to Bobsville or not.
Series.SeriesName: Bob the Builder - Project Build It

Episode.Overview: Bob makes a really big plan will it succeed?

In this colorful extended episode of the Bob the Builder animated series, viewers learn about Bob's history and how he began his job as a construction worker. It covers such events as Bob's first building assignment with his dad Robert, the beginning of his work partnership with Wendy, and his initial encounters with such characters as Lofty, Muck, Scoop, Dizzy, and Roley; it then shows Bob building his own yard.

Go west as Bob and the crew are thrown into an adventure filled with gold mines, campfires and the legend of a long lost treasure. Join the team as they meet a cowgirl named Rio, her horse, Dollar, and her pickup truck, Jackaroo, and take on the biggest building adventure yet!

After several inches of snow fall and delay the start of a new project, Bob asks Zoomer the snowmobile for help. But Bob should have known the only one he needed to call was Scrambler, who is always ready to rescue any situation.

Pre-schoolers' favorite construction hero Bob the Builder stars in this hour long animated movie, following Bob and his Can-Do Crew as they race to complete a new sports stadium for Sunflower Valley. They need to finish it extremely quickly, but with the use of teamwork, and the help of some new friends, the crew might just get the project done in time.
Bob's crew are nervous as they start work on the Sunflower Valley project, but Muck claims not to be afraid. However, her confidence soon disappears when she and Spud get lost in the woods.
Lofty finds it hard to tell Bob that he wants a place in the new machine shelter.

Episode.EpisodeName: While Bob's Away, Robert Will Play

Episode.Overview: Spud causes chaos when he looks after the radio station and announces on air that a storm is on the way
Mr Carruthers, the chief building inspector, casts an eye over Bob's work
